name: ROBOT.TOWER.DEFENSE
description:
THE GAME 

RTD is a tower defense game about robots going crazy and engineers building stuff to destroy them. Print your own parts to develop new machinery and survive.

 CONTROLS 

Click on defenses and place them on the map. Each defense has their own placement and ability. 

FEATURES 

Easy to play. Hard to master. Innovate strategy by managing your resources in each level. Try your best to keep as many resources as possible to upgrade your machines.

 HOW TO PLAY 

Place your 3D printer to start producing pieces. Use pieces to build machines. Use machines to survive. 

ROBOTS KILL 

TOWER IS YOU 

DEFEND YOURSELF

CREDITS

Game and level designer : Alfredo Castaño

Programmer: Joaquín Macías

2D Artist: Adriel Jan

3D Artist: Emilio Muñoz
